definition: to constrict/to draw tight/to gather (one's thoughts)/to bring to a close/to pack (for a journey)
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: The locks prevent its downward and upward movement at the same time stimulating energy.
sentences.chinese: 收束在阻塞了能量上下运动的同时，也刺激着能量。

sentences.english: The ending is the content of the speech pack.
sentences.chinese: 结尾是演讲内容的收束。

sentences.english: Moola bandha is also excellent for treating prolapse, leucorrhoea and urinary (stress) incontinence.
sentences.chinese: 会阴收束对治疗下垂，白带及尿失禁同样成效显著。

sentences.english: Bandhas involve the contraction or squeezing of muscles.
sentences.chinese: “收束”伴随着肌肉的收缩或挤压。

sentences.english: Moola bandha has also proved to be useful in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 会阴收束被证实对分娩同样有帮助。

sentences.english: Finally, jalandhara bandha also compresses the carotid sinuses which help in lowering the blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 最后，下颌收束也可挤压颈动脉窦，有助于降低血压。

sentences.english: Bandhas are essential components of the ujjayi breathing technique.
sentences.chinese: 收束法是喉式呼吸的基本组成部分。

sentences.english: All the Shengge Qinyin choke on a mean potential.
sentences.chinese: 所有的笙歌琴音收束于一个指势。

sentences.english: Each bandha is a lock, meaning a closing off of part of the interior body.
sentences.chinese: 每个收束法是一把锁，意思是要关住体内的某个部分。

sentences.english: In the beginning moola bandha should be practiced with antar kumbhaka (internal breath retention).
sentences.chinese: 开始时，会阴收束要结合内屏息一起练习。
收束影响了各个内分泌腺体。

definition: to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)
variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
(literary) to eliminate/to put an end to
pubic region/point two inches below the navel where one's qi resides
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
